Room.Name: West Hafnia Boulevard/Hafnia Circle Road
Room.ShortDescription: This is the intersection of the central boulevard of Hafnia and the circle.
Room.LongDescription: The circle continues to the north and south bringing you around to the other side of the city. The circle is more or less deserted with the exception of some cheers and noise to the north. The east/west boulevard will take you through the center of this beautiful little mountain city.
